posts.title: ZeroPress version 0.3
posts.body:
version 0.3

May 19th 2019


This version comes with the ability to add images inside your posts.



It is still in a primitive stage, so after insertion you will have to drag and drop it at the point of your document you want it to exist. The feature where it will be placed right where you type, will be implemented in a later version. Not the next one.


It also comes with some minor modifications to the code which from now on will also be available on github. ZeroNet GitCenter will be next.


version 0.2


This version comes with an updater. This way, hopefully, all next versions will be easily installed and new features will be available for users' sites, without them having to manually changing the content of their sites' folders.


Apart from this, there was some minor upgrades to the code, and "ZeroMe" was added to the available social media buttons


version 0.1


A rather crude attempt to create a blogging platform for ZeroNet.


It yet lacks fundamental functionality like the ability to post comments and in-post images, but we 'll get there sooner or later.


For the time, you can access the admin panel by appending the "admin/" text to your nav bar, after your zite url and you can start making changes to your zite.


You can easily create a new ZeroPress blog by cloning this one.


This attempt owes a lot to the pell editor, developed by jared reich, which you can find here.


Due to an insurmountable insufficiency of documentation, most of the development was done with plain trial and error. An attempt to track every bug was made, but users should keep in mind that this a beta version of a blogging platform in a beta version of a new network.


Would love to hear some feedback to the ZeroMail that you 'll find on the menu or at the footer
